text: Alexander Mark David Oxlade-Chamberlain (born 15 August 1993) is an English professional footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Beşiktaş and the England national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup
